column6: ood Green North Jn –  Langley Jn
column18:
1Passenger operation can be planned for Fast /
Main lines only.   ECS can be planned for Fast /
Main and Slow lines.
2For all planned movements and unplanned
diversions when returning to Fast / Main lines a
maximum speed of 70mph applies until the unit
has passed the next signal.
3Shall be planned for Fast / Main lines only
4For unplanned diversions when returning to
Fast/Main lines a maximum speed of 70mph
applies until the unit has passed the next signal
